# [Interview #123: SciFi.com Chat, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=123#12)

#### Tamyrlin

Has a
*gholam*
ever been in Caemlyn?

#### Robert Jordan

Read and find out! :)
